data.title: CHITTAGONG PRAYER TIMES: مواقيت الصلاة
data.meta_description: Chittagong Prayer Times - Today Chittagong prayer timings are Fajr Time 4:09 AM, Dhuhr Time 11:58 AM, Asr Time 4:32 PM, Maghrib Time 6:27 PM and Isha Time 7:47 PM. Get monthly Chittagong salah timings and 7 days accurate Chittagong prayer time table.
data.text:
Today Prayer Times Chittagong, Bangladesh

Today 11 Aug, 2024, Chittagong Namaz Timings are Fajr 4:09 AM, Dhuhr 11:58 AM, Asr 4:32 PM, Maghrib 6:27 PM & Isha 7:47 PM.

The city azan, salat schedule & 7 days time table is also provided. Daily Fajar (Fajr) timing in Chittagong, Dhuhur time, Asr time in Chittagong, Maghrib Chittagong prayer times & Isha Chittagong Namaz timing are available. Today's 05 Safar 1446 Chittagong namaz timing with next 7 days Schedule from 11 Aug, 2024 to 17 Aug, 2024 with customizable prayer time calculation methods to calculate the proper time for your prayer. On other hand, you may also read Chittagong zawal time updates with complete start and end time details.

Today Chittagong Sun Set time or Iftar Time in Chittagong is 5:29 AM and Dawn break Time or the end of Sehri Time in Chittagong is 4:09 AM. Along with Chittagong Prayers times you can also read the Chittagong Sehri and Iftar time for Fiqa Hanafi (sunni) or Chittagong Sehri and Iftar time for Fiqa Jafria (shia).

Prayer Timing Customization

By using this option you can change or adjust timing according to your country's prayer calculation methods. These timings are available for all Sunni schools of thought including Hanafi, Shafi, Maliki, and Hanbali.

You may also find here makrooh time updates including Chittagong zawal time with complete details start and end time.

Chittagong Sun Set time that is also called Iftar Time in Chittagong is 6:28 PM and Dawn break Time that is also end of Sehri Time in Chittagong at 4:08 AM. Sehri and Iftar time is also called Ramadan Time during the month of Ramadan.

Chittagong is an Islamic city with Muslims in the majority. Islam is the state religion and Muslims constitute 84% of the total population. The Chittagong Division has some centuries-old mosques. Binat Bibi Masjid, Shaista Khan Masjid, and Lalbagh Fort Masjid are among the historic mosques. However, they are constructed in the year 1454, 1664, and 1678 respectively. All mosques present in the city follow Chittagong prayer time. Besides local Muslims, people from other communities also live in Chittagong.

People from other religions including Hinduism, Christianity, and Buddhism also live in Chittagong. Rohingya refugees, Tripuris, Rakhines, Chakmas are present in the city. Baruas are the Bengali-speaking Theravada Buddhists of Chittagong and regarded as the city’s oldest community. Catholics and Urdu-speaking Bihari communities are also present in the area. Holi, Diwali, Durga Puja, Buddha Purnima, Christmas, and Easter are celebrated by the non-Muslim community. Besides religious events, they also celebrate Victory Day, Language Martyrs’ Day, and Independence Day on 16 December, 21 February, and 26 March respectively along with Mangal Shobhajatra.

Muslims celebrate all Islamic events as per the Hijri calendar. Eid ul Fitr, Eid ul Adha, Ashura, Shab e Miraj, Shab e Barat, and Eid Milad un Nabi are observed with great enthusiasm. In Ramadan, Muslims visit mosques in large numbers. However, the Chittagong prayer time varies with respect to the jurisdiction method and sect. In the Hanafi and Shafii juristic method, there is a difference over the Asr prayer starting time. You can offer salat as both Hanafi prayer time and Shafii prayer time in Chittagong are mentioned here. If you belong to the Ahle Tashayyu sect then you can check the accurate Chittagong Shia prayer time.

In big cities, a difference of a minute or two can be observed in their suburbs or nearby areas due to the bigger geographic area. However, this Chittagong Prayer timing schedule can be used by people living in different areas. The updated Chittagong Prayer timing 2022 is created to assist people of all Upazilas or Thanas of Chittagong including Anwara Upazila, Boalkhali Upazila, Fatikchhari Upazila, Karnaphuli Upazila, Banshkhali Upazila, Chandanaish Upazila, Hathazari Upazila, and Lohagara Upazila.

Chittagong Prayer Times Today

Prayer Time in Chittagong for Sunday 11 Aug 2024 are:

Fajr Time in Chittagong: 4:09 AM

Zuhr Time in Chittagong: 11:58 AM

Asr Time in Chittagong: 4:32 PM

Maghrib Time in Chittagong: 6:27 PM

Isha Time in Chittagong: 7:47 PM

Q: What is Fajr time in Chittagong?

A: Fajr start time in Chittagong is at 4:09 AM and end time is 5:29 AM. Fajr consists of 4 Rakats as 2 Farz and 2 Sunnah.

Q: What time is Ishraq in Chittagong?

A: Ishraq Namaz Timing in Chittagong today starts at 05:44 AM and the end time is 08:43 AM.

Q: What is Zuhr Time in Chittagong?

A: Zuhr starting time in Chittagong is at 11:58 AM and the ending time is 4:32 PM. Zuhr Salah consists of 12 Rakat, including 4 Sunnah, 4 Farz, 2 Sunnah, and 2 nafl.

Q: What is Asr time in Chittagong?

A: Today Asr prayer start time in Chittagong is 4:32 PM, and it ends at 6:27 PM. It's an afternoon prayer consisting of 8 Rakat: 4 Sunnat and 4 Farz.

Q: What time is Maghrib in Chittagong?

A: Maghrib start time in Chittagong is at 6:27 PM, and the maghrib time end is 7:47 PM. It's a sunset prayer consisting of 7 Rakat: 3 Farz, 2 Sunnat, and 2 Nafl.

Q: What is Isha Time in Chittagong?

A: Today Isha Namaz time Chittagong starts at 7:47 PM and ends time at 4:09 AM. It's a night prayer consisting of 17 Rakat: 4 Sunnah, 4 Fard, 2 Sunnah, 2 Nafl, 3 Witr, and 2 Nafl.
